feed.title: LinkAce Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for LinkAce: v2.1.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Enable SSO logins through the bookmarklet. by @geoffholden in https://github.com/Kovah/LinkAce/pull/932
  • Handling of tag and list selects was overhauled to correct #936
  • The setup now uses psql instead of pg_restore for Postgres databases
  • Minor design fixes

New Contributors

  • @geoffholden made their first contribution in https://github.com/Kovah/LinkAce/pull/932

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Kovah/LinkAce/compare/v2.1.4...v2.1.5

entry.title: New release for LinkAce: v2.1.6
entry.content: • Fixes the search after it was not working correctly when searching with tags or lists

entry.title: New release for LinkAce: v2.1.7
entry.content:
• Links can now properly be sorted on the details page of Lists. (#941)
  • Minor fixes and adjustments for the SQLite web setup.
  • Dependencies were updated.

entry.title: New release for LinkAce: v2.1.8
entry.content:
• Tag and List relations are now properly removed for deleted Links. (#941)
  • Dependencies were updated.
